charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) Possession of Cocaine Base with Intent to Distribute (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Cnt 1-Custody bureau of prisons for 140 mons concurrent to 93-689-IEG. Spv release for 5 yrs. $50 penalty assessment. No fine. Ct recommends western region and where dft will participate in 500 hrs drug program.....SENTENCING AFTER REVERSAL AND REMAND BY THE USCA ON 2/2/99 [NUNC PRO TUNC 12/14/98]-Dft committed to custody of BOP 120 months as to cnt 1, 60 months as to cnt 2 to run consecutive to cnt 1; spv release 5 years; P/A $50.00 as to cnt 1, P/A $50.00 as to cnt 2 ordered remitted on Govt's oral motion (1)
